details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 5 Version identification - amd prefix
details.description: Property amd of the PDF/UA Identification Schema shall have namespace prefix pdfuaid

rule.description: Property amd of the PDF/UA Identification Schema shall have namespace prefix pdfuaid

error.message: Property amd of the PDF/UA Identification Schema has invalid namespace prefix %1
